rules.natural: If vehicle1 is deployed in region alpha, then the mission for vehicle1 is a go.
Provided that vehicle1 is docked at platform station, it follows that vehicle1 is secured at platform station.

Under the condition that vehicle1 is secured at platform station, then, if it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), the mission of vehicle1 is aborted.
Whenever vehicle1 is inspected at platform station, vehicle1 is cleared.
Given that vehicle1 is cleared, then, provided that vehicle1 is not deployed in region alpha, vehicle1 has a malfunction.
Under the condition that vehicle1 is scheduled at platform station, vehicle1 is docked at platform station.
Whenever a backup for vehicle1 is activated, the backup for vehicle1 malfunctions.

If it is not the case that (if vehicle1 is scheduled at platform station then (if it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling) then the mission of vehicle1 is aborted)), then a backup for vehicle1 is activated.
Provided that it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), it follows that the mission of vehicle1 is not aborted.

facts.natural: Vehicle1 is inspected at platform station.
Vehicle1 is scheduled at platform station.
Vehicle1 does not have a malfunction.
The backup for vehicle1 does not malfunction.

target.natural: The mission for vehicle1 is a go.

If the mission for vehicle1 is not a go, then vehicle1 requires refueling.

If it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), then the mission of vehicle1 is aborted.
If the mission for vehicle1 is not a go, then vehicle1 requires refueling.
The mission for vehicle1 is a go.

natural_expressions: If vehicle1 is deployed in region alpha, then the mission for vehicle1 is a go.
Whenever vehicle1 is docked at platform station, then, if it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), the mission of vehicle1 is aborted.
Provided that vehicle1 is docked at platform station, it follows that vehicle1 is secured at platform station.

Under the condition that vehicle1 is secured at platform station, then, if it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), the mission of vehicle1 is aborted.
If vehicle1 is inspected at platform station, then, if vehicle1 is not deployed in region alpha, vehicle1 has a malfunction.
Whenever vehicle1 is inspected at platform station, vehicle1 is cleared.
Given that vehicle1 is cleared, then, provided that vehicle1 is not deployed in region alpha, vehicle1 has a malfunction.
If vehicle1 is scheduled at platform station, then, in case it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), the mission of vehicle1 is aborted.
Under the condition that vehicle1 is scheduled at platform station, vehicle1 is docked at platform station.
Whenever a backup for vehicle1 is activated, the backup for vehicle1 malfunctions.

If it is not the case that (if vehicle1 is scheduled at platform station then (if it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling) then the mission of vehicle1 is aborted)), then a backup for vehicle1 is activated.
If it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), then the mission of vehicle1 is aborted.
Provided that it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), it follows that the mission of vehicle1 is not aborted.

(A1 → G).natural: If vehicle1 is deployed in region alpha, then the mission for vehicle1 is a go.

(A10 → (¬(¬G → A5) → A6)).natural: Whenever vehicle1 is docked at platform station, then, if it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), the mission of vehicle1 is aborted.

(A10 → A11).natural: Provided that vehicle1 is docked at platform station, it follows that vehicle1 is secured at platform station.

(A11 → (¬(¬G → A5) → A6)).natural: Under the condition that vehicle1 is secured at platform station, then, if it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), the mission of vehicle1 is aborted.

(A3 → (¬A1 → A2)).natural: If vehicle1 is inspected at platform station, then, if vehicle1 is not deployed in region alpha, vehicle1 has a malfunction.

(A3 → A4).natural: Whenever vehicle1 is inspected at platform station, vehicle1 is cleared.

(A4 → (¬A1 → A2)).natural: Given that vehicle1 is cleared, then, provided that vehicle1 is not deployed in region alpha, vehicle1 has a malfunction.

(A7 → (¬(¬G → A5) → A6)).natural: If vehicle1 is scheduled at platform station, then, in case it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), the mission of vehicle1 is aborted.

(A7 → A10).natural: Under the condition that vehicle1 is scheduled at platform station, vehicle1 is docked at platform station.

(A8 → A9).natural: Whenever a backup for vehicle1 is activated, the backup for vehicle1 malfunctions.

(¬(A7 → (¬(¬G → A5) → A6)) → A8).natural: If it is not the case that (if vehicle1 is scheduled at platform station then (if it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling) then the mission of vehicle1 is aborted)), then a backup for vehicle1 is activated.

(¬(¬G → A5) → A6).natural: If it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), then the mission of vehicle1 is aborted.

(¬(¬G → A5) → ¬A6).natural: Provided that it is not the case that (if the mission for vehicle1 is not a go then vehicle1 requires refueling), it follows that the mission of vehicle1 is not aborted.

(¬A1 → A2).natural: If vehicle1 is not deployed in region alpha, then vehicle1 has a malfunction.

(¬G → A5).natural: If the mission for vehicle1 is not a go, then vehicle1 requires refueling.

A1.natural: Vehicle1 is deployed in region alpha.

A3.natural: Vehicle1 is inspected at platform station.

A7.natural: Vehicle1 is scheduled at platform station.

G.natural: The mission for vehicle1 is a go.

¬A2.natural: Vehicle1 does not have a malfunction.

¬A8.natural: A backup for vehicle1 is not activated.

¬A9.natural: The backup for vehicle1 does not malfunction.
